title: All my Gods strategy title

Even gods grow old. So does Saturn, one of the oldest gods of Rome. He decides to retire, and wants his son to take his place. He has to prove that he is worthy of their trust and divine powers he is about to receive.

The future seems bright and glorious for the son of Saturn. But not all the great gods are willing to welcome newcomers at the Capitoline Hill. Mars ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ the god of war loses his temper every time he hears someone speak about the newbie. On top of that our hero falls in love with MarsÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s beloved Venus and Mars swears to never allow the youngling become a god.


Lead SaturnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s son to the top of the Pantheon! Help him become a mighty god! Use divine powers to change the life of Romans. Make your small village prosper and grow into an Empire! Outsmart the evil gods! Make friends with the nice ones! And win the heart of the most beautiful of them all!
